author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:
As requested in https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/gt-offline-conditions-for-ul-nanov15-reprocessing/134970

#### PR validation:
Being a clone of the previous 141X GT, I don't expect any issue or difference in the results of the tests in Run1 or Run2 workflows.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. 
Backport of #49222 back till to the release intended to be used in the Run2-re-reco (re-nano, in fact), supposedly CMSSW_15_0_X, see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48176
title: [CMSSW_15_1_X] Replace the GT for Run2 data re-reco in autoCond with a 150X clone of previous 141X_dataRun2_v3
